sidebarinfo &sidebarinfo.purpose;
&sidebarinfo.synopsis.gen; Description
The SidebarInfo element is a wrapper for a large collection of meta-information about a Sidebar. Much of this data is bibliographic in nature.
Processing expectations
&format.suppress; Many of the elements in this wrapper may be used in presentation, but they are not generally printed as part of the formatting of the wrapper. It merely serves to identify where they occur.
